summary: This test suite validates the functionality of helper utilities and client integration for AWS X-Ray. It uses Moto to mock AWS services and checks operations such as batch fetching of service graphs and traces, trace graph retrieval, telemetry submission, trace segment uploading, trace summary creation, context patching, DynamoDB request ID handling, and UDP emitter behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee that X-Ray tracing components work correctly within the application, enabling accurate monitoring, debugging, and performance analysis of AWS services.
